title: Facebook and Instagram are getting paid verification badges, just like Twitter
description: Meta Verified will begin testing in Australia and New Zealand this week.

description: Bloober Team's next game has a new (old) name, and a June release window.

description: First-person horror with vinyl records? Don't mind if I do.

description: It's a Telltale game, alright.

title: Company of Heroes 3 review
description: Relic's latest is a failed experiment but a great game.

description: I know all I need to know about a person's D&D alignment by the state of their desktop and background.

description: The Kickstarter campaign for Geneforge 2: Infestation is already a huge success.
